data.md:MetaData: (Table T38) Secondary minerals in fine fraction sampled from alkaline series of basalts from Emperor Seamount chain, Leg 55: Hole 430A (Ojin seamount), Hole 432A (Nintoku seamount), and Holes 433A and 433C (Suiko seamount)
9 cores, 59 m cored, 28.5 m drilled, 31.1 % recovery
Alteration effects in the upper oceanic crust - data and comments (Technical Note)
